role_description: An Ansible role that installs git-secret on Linux and MacOS
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs git-secret on Linux and MacOS. git-secret is a bash tool to store your private data inside a git repo. How’s that? Basically, it just encrypts, using gpg, the tracked files with the public keys of all the users that you trust. So everyone of them can decrypt these files using only their personal secret key.
